welcome_message_body: Welcome to Quetzaltenango, Guatemala! Known for its vibrant culture, stunning landscapes, and charming colonial architecture, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Cafe Barista

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Quetzaltenango Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Quetzaltenango Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Base Aerea Del Sur Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Base Aerea Del Sur Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in some areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Coatepeque Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Quiche Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Quiche Airport, handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
